name: A Divine Guide To Puzzle Solving
name_original: A Divine Guide To Puzzle Solving
description:
How many mortals does it take to populate Mars? Trick question, they are all dead before it could even happen. – The Mighty Tobla

Embark on an otherworldly journey in A Divine Guide To Puzzle Solving, a captivating narrative puzzle adventure that transports you to the mystical realm of the gods.

As a mere mortal, your destiny takes an unexpected turn when you are chosen by the enigmatic puzzle deity Tobla. This eccentric divine being has bestowed upon you the honour of testing the latest collection of puzzle trials it has designed - all completely (not) at your free will, of course.

Your key to solving Tobla's puzzle creations lies in an ancient power - the Swap Beam. Use this unique ability to swap the positions of objects in the game world and face the logical challenges that the deity throws at you.

If you can complete your task as a divine puzzle tester, you may just find a way back home.



KEY FEATURES

  • Captivating physics-based puzzles:
Test your puzzle-solving skills in the divine trials and prove your worth to the puzzle deity.

  • Engaging storyline with comedic elements:
 Unravel more of Tobla's personality and the deity's motives after each level.

  • Picturesque 3D visuals:
 Floating sky islands and fiery, hellish underworld pits await you in the realm of the gods.
